name: Arts
description: Dive into the world of creative expression, spanning visual arts, literature, and theater. Explore famous artists, their masterpieces, and the various artistic movements that have shaped culture throughout history.

name: Geography
description: Embark on a journey across continents, countries, and cities. Discover natural wonders, geopolitical boundaries, and the diverse cultures that inhabit our world.

name: History
description: Step back in time to witness the events, figures, and decisions that have forged our present. From ancient civilizations to modern-day revolutions, uncover the stories that have shaped humanity.

name: Science
description: Delve into the realm of discovery, experimentation, and understanding. Explore the intricacies of biology, the vastness of space, and the fundamental laws that govern our universe.

name: Technology
description: Navigate the ever-evolving landscape of tools, machines, and digital advancements. Understand the inventions that have revolutionized our lives and the innovators behind them.

name: Music
description: Tune into the rhythms, melodies, and harmonies that have echoed through the ages. Learn about legendary musicians, iconic albums, and the diverse genres that provide a soundtrack to our lives.

name: Movies
description: Step onto the silver screen and immerse yourself in the world of cinema. Dive into classic films, modern blockbusters, and the visionary directors who bring stories to life.
